rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entryway that adheres to Kerala architecture with intricate woodwork and stone finishes. Accessible entrance for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living area with open space, traditional Kerala motifs on walls and ceilings; includes seating arrangement and a central chandelier that respects Vastu for light flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room. Traditional design with low tables and comfortable seating. Positioned per Vastu guidelines ensuring balance between east and west.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional modern kitchen designed in a Kerala style with stone countertops and tiled flooring; wheelchair accessible layout with appliances at reachable heights.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet corner dedicated to reading, featuring built-in bookshelves and ample natural light from east facing window as per Vastu. Designed for accessibility.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with Kerala style detailing; en-suite bathroom adjoining and wheelchair accessible features such as grab bars and non-slip floors.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room ensuring privacy, incorporating traditional motifs and a built-in wardrobe. Accessible design for wheelchair users.

openings.description: Main entrance door with wide clearance for wheelchair access; features traditional Kerala woodwork and a vestibule.
Large east-facing window to maximize natural light and ensure Vastu compliance in the living area.
South facing windows for balanced lighting and ventilation, designed for accessibility.
East-facing window providing ample natural light to the library while respecting Vastu principles.
Accessible door from the living area to kitchen with sufficient width and handle for ease of use.
